transcript:
Aa gaye aapne?
Han sir.
Han bas main mushkil se 20 minute mein pahunch jaunga 20 minute mein connect kar raha hun aapko.
20 minute theek hai okay theek hai. Hai na actually sir pata hai na 100 bahar nikal gaya tha bas 20 minute mein office pahunch ke connect karta hun.
Thik hai thik hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive will connect in 20 minutes.



Resolution:

- Okay, the executive will connect in 20 minutes.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None
